publicationStmt.publisher: By Evan Tyler, Printer to the Kings most excellent Majestie,

notesStmt.note: Text begins: Forsameikle as the Committee of Estates taking to their serious consideration, the many practices and endeavours used against this kingdom, by some unnaturall countrey-men and traitors, joyned with Irish rebels within the same ...
Signed at foot of text: Arch. Primerose.
An act for a new levy.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
